attributes.action: Tampons/Sanitry Towels should be free for Females.
attributes.additional_details: WOMEN! Its time to we stood up. We have our monthly period, some of us heavier than others. Some women cant even afford sanitary items due to poverty. Why should we have to pay for tampons or pads?! Contraception is free, medication to stop bleeding is free, so why not sanitary items?! Did you know they TAX sanitary items?! Why pay tax on something we use as a regular monthly thing that we have to attach to our underwear or stick up our vaginas. Its NOT FAIR. I'm calling a stand today, we should get these free. Its a natural process of a women's life, lets get these provided for us.

rejection.details: Please see: Free Tampons Available to All Who Require Them
